_description: An Epiphany carol — three quatrains(aaab) and burden: ‘Who wot nowe þat ys here / Where he schall be anoder yere’

BLAdd40166c3.First Lines:
Anoder yere hit may betydeThis compeny to be full
                    wyde…
BLAdd40166c3.Last Lines:
…Hyt lendith lytull in hur threteCryste may send sich a
                    yere
